languages.text: "Отвратительно". {n}Соломон поднимает к лицу слегка дрожащую железную ладонь и сжимает в кулак.{/n} "Но я не дам себе развалиться на куски — одной позорной слабости более чем достаточно".
"Terribly." {n}Solomorne brings his slightly trembling iron hand to his face, then clenches it into a fist.{/n} "But I won't let myself fall apart — one shameful weakness was more than enough."
languages.original_text: "Отвратительно". {n}Соломон поднимает к лицу слегка дрожащую железную ладонь и сжимает в кулак.{/n} "Но я не дам себе развалиться на куски — одной позорной слабости более чем достаточно".

"Terribly." {n}Solomorne brings his slightly trembling iron hand to his face, then clenches it into a fist.{/n} "But I won't let myself fall apart — one shameful weakness was more than enough."

languages.text: 「最悪です」{n}ソロモーンはわずかに震える鉄の手を顔に当て、そして拳を握りしめた。{/n}「ですが、もう崩れたりはしません。あんな恥ずべき弱さは、一度で十分です」
languages.original_text: "Terribly." {n}Solomorne brings his slightly trembling iron hand to his face, then clenches it into a fist.{/n} "But I won't let myself fall apart — one shameful weakness was more than enough."

traits.locale_text: 「最悪です」{n}ソロモーンはわずかに震える鉄の手を顔に当て、そして拳を握りしめた。{/n}「ですが、もう崩れたりはしません。あんな恥ずべき弱さは、一度で十分です」

languages.text: "Schrecklich." {n}Solomorne hält seine leicht zitternde Eisenhand vors Gesicht und ballt sie dann zur Faust.{/n} "Aber ich werde nicht zerbrechen – eine schändliche Schwäche war mehr als genug."
languages.original_text: "Terribly." {n}Solomorne brings his slightly trembling iron hand to his face, then clenches it into a fist.{/n} "But I won't let myself fall apart — one shameful weakness was more than enough."

traits.locale_text: "Schrecklich." {n}Solomorne hält seine leicht zitternde Eisenhand vors Gesicht und ballt sie dann zur Faust.{/n} "Aber ich werde nicht zerbrechen – eine schändliche Schwäche war mehr als genug."

languages.text: « Elles sont mauvaises. » {n}D'un geste mal assuré, Solomorne porte sa main d'acier à son visage avant de la refermer rageusement.{/n} « Mais je refuse de me laisser abattre. Cette unique faiblesse était déjà de trop. »
languages.original_text: "Terribly." {n}Solomorne brings his slightly trembling iron hand to his face, then clenches it into a fist.{/n} "But I won't let myself fall apart — one shameful weakness was more than enough."

traits.locale_text: « Elles sont mauvaises. » {n}D'un geste mal assuré, Solomorne porte sa main d'acier à son visage avant de la refermer rageusement.{/n} « Mais je refuse de me laisser abattre. Cette unique faiblesse était déjà de trop. »

languages.text: «Muchísimo». {n}Solomorne se lleva la temblorosa mano de hierro a la cara, y luego cierra el puño con fuerza.{/n} «Pero no me vendré abajo; con un vergonzoso momento de debilidad ya he tenido bastante».
languages.original_text: "Terribly." {n}Solomorne brings his slightly trembling iron hand to his face, then clenches it into a fist.{/n} "But I won't let myself fall apart — one shameful weakness was more than enough."

traits.locale_text: «Muchísimo». {n}Solomorne se lleva la temblorosa mano de hierro a la cara, y luego cierra el puño con fuerza.{/n} «Pero no me vendré abajo; con un vergonzoso momento de debilidad ya he tenido bastante».

languages.text: “相当糟糕。”{n}索罗蒙用微微颤抖的铁手捂住了脸，之后握紧了拳头。{/n}“但我不会放任自己崩溃，一个可耻的弱点已经足够多了。”
languages.original_text: "Terribly." {n}Solomorne brings his slightly trembling iron hand to his face, then clenches it into a fist.{/n} "But I won't let myself fall apart — one shameful weakness was more than enough."

traits.locale_text: “相当糟糕。”{n}索罗蒙用微微颤抖的铁手捂住了脸，之后握紧了拳头。{/n}“但我不会放任自己崩溃，一个可耻的弱点已经足够多了。”

languages.text: "Korkunç." {n}Solomorne, hafifçe titreyen demir elini yüzüne götürüyor. Eli yumruğa dönüşüyor.{/n} "Ancak artık toparlanmam gerekiyor. Bu utanç verici zayıflık yetti de arttı."
languages.original_text: "Terribly." {n}Solomorne brings his slightly trembling iron hand to his face, then clenches it into a fist.{/n} "But I won't let myself fall apart — one shameful weakness was more than enough."

languages.original_text: "Terribly." {n}Solomorne brings his slightly trembling iron hand to his face, then clenches it into a fist.{/n} "But I won't let myself fall apart — one shameful weakness was more than enough."
